TaxEngineProvider.name: TaxEngineProvider
TaxEngineProvider.description: Represents general information about a service that manages a tax engine, such as the ID of the tax adapter Apex class in Salesforce, and the engine’s namespace prefix. Tax engine providers have a one-to-many relationship with tax engines, where the tax engine record represents a specific configuration of a tax engine that can be assigned to multiple order items.

ApexAdapterId.description: The Id of the Apex adapter used by this tax provider. This field is unique within your organization.

Description.description: The description of the tax engine provider.

DeveloperName.description: The API name for the record.

Language.description: The language used by this tax engine provider. Values appear based on their language codes in Salesforce, such as da for Danish or th for Thai.

MasterLabel.description: Label used for the tax engine’s API in Salesforce.

NamespacePrefix.description: Apex namespace prefix of the API used for the tax engine. In a packaging context, a namespace prefix is a one to 15-character alphanumeric identifier that distinguishes your package and its contents from packages of other developers on AppExchange.
